alert.note: Alert for Northern Nye County - Mojave (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued June 14 at 1:26PM PDT until June 17 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 426... The National Weather Service in Elko has issued a Fire Weather Watch for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Thursday morning through Friday evening. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 426 Northern Nye County- Mojave. * Winds...South 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 5 percent. * Impacts...The combination of gusty winds and low humidity will create critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A fire weather watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
